title: T.V. commercials: Dulux
creator_credit: George Patterson Creative Group and Senior Film Productions
brief_description: Presents two 60-second commercials with an identical tag line: “The one paint good enough”. Illustrates the paint company’s product in old and new settings: Como House in Melbourne and a new jet airliner for Trans Australia Airlines.
